fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Raise a dead player's corpse each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock and redirect immune.
- You may make your raised corpse use one of their abilities on any legal target. The corpse you target uses the ability and performs the visit. You visit the corpse.
- You learn all night feedback that the corpse would receive.
- You may in fact use the ability of a dead player whose corpse has already been raised by yourself or another role that can raise corpses.
- You may not use the ability of a dead player whose role is hidden.
